vsParam:
Hey, [px].
I've checked the emerald board you gave me.

First, the conclusion is...
It's authentic.

Huh, is it!?
So maybe we can sell it for a fortune...

No, it's too expensive, or even priceless.
Because it's... the recipe of the "Pyroxene of Wisdom".

The "Pyroxene of Wisdom" is that thing!?
The legendary peak of alchemy!

O... OK! Just as its name implies, it's an incredible stone that
will only be made with the highest level of wisdom!

Wow...
The "Pyroxene of Wisdom" is so impressive...

Sigh, I can't believe this is its recipe...
We found an incredible thing...

Haha, isn't it good!?
We've got the recipe, which means... [px]?

Ah, [px] freezes in surprise.
OK, let me tell you how [px] might feel right now.

[px} could become a solo alchemist, get recognized by people,
and repay people by making the "Pyroxene of Wisdom"... I guess so.

Ah, Peppermint said that too.
Haha, she's right.

Hehe, I think [px] would think so.
But unfortunately... this recipe is not complete.

This fragment belongs to a whole piece of emerald board.
But it's broken into several fragments.

What... You mean we can't make
the "Pyroxene of Wisdom" now...

Yeah. But if you could gather other fragments of this emerald board.
Hopefully... you can take this back now, [px].
Whatever you'll deal with it... it's your call.

You have a dream, right? You said you want to make a great alchemist
so as not to fail people in the Academy who are like your "family".

This emerald board may be helpful to your dream.
For your future's sake, I suggest you keep it.
